website_summaries.verdict: You’ll pay a bit more for this option, but the quality and feature set more than make up for it.
pros: Best pick in terms of quality and features
Charcoal baskets are great for cooking with direct or indirect heat
The ash cleaning and venting systems are top rate
cons: Kettle is so deep, you’ll have a hard time trying to sear meat
Number of features make assembly difficult

customer_reviews.title: I Absolutely love this grill!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm in love with this grill. I can smoke on it and just straight grill. All the accessories in my mind are worth the extra cost. Setting the bottom and top vent correctly and using hardwood charcoal I was able to maintain a perfect 350 degrees while I smoked 3 chicken breasts. It took about 35 min to do. Make sure to mark the bottom vent with a sharpie. Writing half and open makes life a little easier. The absolute only downside is the legs. This is the only spot they went cheap on. If you're just moving it a little to cook then back there should be no issues. All in all I'm very happy
customer_reviews.author: Isaiah's Reviews

customer_reviews.title: A Very Sensible Choice
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Cleaning not bad but porcelain coated grate would be ideal. Four legs would be sturdier but three works. Kettle top holder is a big plus as well as thermometer. Offering a cast iron grate at a reasonable cost for this grill would be a plus. These grills are tried and true. Ash catcher works like a champ! You can't go wrong. Well packaged for shipment.
customer_reviews.author: fmnnc

customer_reviews.title: should have bought the regular model
customer_reviews.text: These extra "master touch" features are not that great. I should have just got the original. The bar that you can rest the lid on has a couple nuts on the inside so when you drop the cooking grate it it always seems to catch the grate. Despite being webber made coal boxes, they don't really fit that well against the sides, like the arc circumference is not nearly the same. And lastly, the center removable piece is just annoying.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Easily worth it
customer_reviews.text: I got this grill to help me enjoy the deck of our new home. Pretty much every nice day we have I'm finding an excuse to grill. Do yourself a favor and get a charcoal chimney. I remember struggling getting charcoal to smolder at a hot temperature as a kid (cheaper grill of course). A chimney with some lighter cubes or paper is so much easier. 15 minutes and the charcoal is ready to go. Even in 30ish degree temps it wasn't hard to get the temperature to 500+ and grill some great burgers or steaks (with some wood chips for some added flavor).
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Nice grill, great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Received my grill today. It went together quickly. I had an extra piece when I got done. I looked thru the assembly instructions to see if I missed something. I did not. One of the handles for the cooking grate had broken off (bad weld). No problem. I registered the grill, called customer service and they have another grate being shipped. All I need to do now is wait for a nice day and use it. If Comcast was this easy to deal with they would have a customer for life! LOL
customer_reviews.author: Eire

customer_reviews.title: I love this grill
customer_reviews.text: I love this grill. I was going to buy the cheaper version but my girlfriend talked to me into this model. I'm so glad I did. I love the extras that come with the grill, the thermometer is great, the baskets are perfect for direct and indirect heat.
customer_reviews.author: Edward P.

customer_reviews.title: Weber classic with improvements
customer_reviews.text: My dad had a Weber charcoal grill when I was very young (almost 35 years ago). I remember those delicious burgers and that mouth watering smell. I strayed and went to gas and bought cheap grill after cheap grill, always frustrated and unsatisfied. Finally I wised up and went back to the original, the Weber Kettle grill. This is the best charcoal grill ever made. Perfect temperature, lots of cooking space, and easy to maintain. I highly recommend this grill.
customer_reviews.author: Mac

customer_reviews.title: Great grill
customer_reviews.text: My second Weber kettle. I use it at least 3 times a week. I LOVE the size and features of this grill. But, the instructions are not very good and I'm not very good at reading them. I ruined BOTH nuts that hold the wheels on. They did put one extra in the parts bag, needed another. I called customer service and she shipped me three more, no charge. I did buy the round , iron grill for the center, about to try it out tonight
customer_reviews.author: James Skinner

customer_reviews.title: Third house, third Weber grill
customer_reviews.text: We've purchased this grill three times for multiple houses. Very nice. This purchased set comes with two moon-shaped vessels that are intended to be used to gather coals and keep them separated so there's a cool spot in the center of the grill. That's kind of a waste, to us. We tried using that contraption once, but the coals didn't get hot enough - easier to just spread the coals on the grate. All-in-all, we rely on Weber for charcoal grilling. Works wonderfully and consistently.
customer_reviews.author: LaxMen5Mom

customer_reviews.title: Nearly bought a cart instead of the master touch. I'm glad I didn't
customer_reviews.text: Other reviews suggested the legs where flimsy, not true. I started to put the legs together and noticed the handle. The two legs with wheels go opposite the the main leg at the handle. I wheeled this from the front of the yard to the back of the yard and it was extremely stable. Some suggested the screws for the handle damages the coating. Not true. I had some poly washers that I thought I needed but didn't need to use them. This grill is very well engineered and the ring for tools also holds the hot cover securely. Weber didn't miss a thing. The center holds so many attachments it's absolutely the best grill I've ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus

customer_reviews.title: there is a reason it has been around so long
customer_reviews.text: Today was my first cook on this grill. There is a reason it has been around and popular for so long, It WORKS. I had never used one before today and it was simple to use and cooked my burgers perfect. I did use the charcoal baskets on one side to sear then moved them to the "cold" side to finish cooking. I expected decent burgers but these were, for our home, perfect. Well worth every penny for the upgraded version.
customer_reviews.author: BGC

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Grill has all the features I was looking for....This is like 4th Weber grill I have purchased over the years. I like almost everything about this grill. I found 2 things that could make it even better...materials of the legs pretty thin higher gauge aluminum would take of that. assembly of the legs to the kettle the fasteners could be improved it was pretty hard getting the legs on...I would give this grill 5 stars , if there was not an issue with the assembly .All in all I would purchase again...Looking forward to using it for many years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Carl D. Smith

customer_reviews.title: 22” vs 26” Weber charcoal grill
customer_reviews.text: 26” Weber charcoal grill is not a good value as compared to the 22” Weber charcoal Grill. For the 26” grill, you pay 65% more money for 40% more grill area. The Weber folks apparently think we can’t do the math! (Remember grill area = pi*radius squared). Observation: Two 22” grills give you 43% more grill area than one 26” grill for only 21% more money than the cost of one-26” grill. We have the 22” and love it. We’re thinking of getting a 2nd for our ctg and were considering the 26” - but it is a bad value. 5 stars on everything except value!
customer_reviews.author: SC

customer_reviews.title: A great charcoal barbecue
customer_reviews.text: This is a step up from our previous Weber, having a temperature indicator and a much improved ash container. The leg attachments are much more durable than the less expensive Webers, and the ashes are easily disposed of with little mess. Like any barbecue, the grill must be scrubbed with a wire brush after every use, or the residue builds up quickly. The unit also comes with charcoal trays that allow you to light the coals, and them position them any where under the grill to accommodate the intended cooking style.
customer_reviews.author: Vance Navarrette

customer_reviews.title: A Truly Remarkable Difference!
customer_reviews.text: I can’t speak about this based on other charcoal grills, but if you are a person looking to switch from gas to charcoal, than pull the metaphorical trigger. I have run gas grills for 15 years and thought it was time to try out charcoal before splurging on a pellet grill. There is no reason to spend thousands on great tasting food. I’m no chef, but I would put my food up against anyone’s now that I’ve been running the Weber Mastertouch. Buy a fire starter chimney and you will be grilling the best tasting food you have ever fed your loved ones in 15 mins. Bottom line is I will buy another if this thing ever burns up.
customer_reviews.author: E- money

customer_reviews.title: Our favorite
customer_reviews.text: We have owned so many grills in our time, this however is our favorite. Love the circle in the middle of the grate that you can lift and dump more charcoals in. Haven't bought the accessories yet, but likely will. The lid holder is kind of a big deal. The lid just slides back into it. Excellent! No more little hook to try to catch on the edge. Yes it is a little more money than the others, but well worth it. Love it so much we bought a second one as a house warming gift for our son. This THE charcoal grill to get.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Polk

customer_reviews.title: Great Grill for those who like using charcoal!
customer_reviews.text: An excellent grill, well thought out. I have used the starter cubes with the Weber Rapidfire Chimney which is much faster than using charcoal lighter fluid. But there is a trade off, in that what I thought was a charcoal taste, was as much of a lighter fluid flavoring. So I have been experimenting with adding different flavored woods with different foods, as well as using more creative rubs and marinates for your foods.
customer_reviews.author: Mark W. Carroll, OFS

customer_reviews.title: A great grill that can do it all
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this grill after debating between various different grills (including other weber kettles) and decided the extra features make this a worthwhile upgrade to the weber premium. The fact that it's a bit taller than the other similar sized webers make a difference, as does the sweep that goes around the outside of the kettle and holds the lid. The one touch cleaning system and ash collector pan are all great features that make using this weber easier and more convenient. I've been able to smoke ribs, sear, cook indirectly at medium heat. This little grill does it all.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Chung

customer_reviews.title: Weber 4 life
customer_reviews.text: Anyone that doesn’t own a charcoal grill is nuts. Weber is the best for value and reputation and performance and durability. This one is great, buy this or the premium and never look back. You can do ANYTHING with a Kettle like this and the internet. Buy one. Your life will be better for it.
customer_reviews.author: B. Walpole

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: Returned grill I got. One of blades was shorter and tip bended upward. Looks like from smaller grill!!!! Top vent cover didn't fit well. I love Weber's and have other now but that 'quality' stunned me. Looks like I didn't have enought luck to get a good one. Update: I ordered second one, during shippment box must have been hit so hard that lid came bent with deep bruise on edge Update #2: 3rd purchase at store and love it, changed rating from 1 star to 4 star.
customer_reviews.author: Damian Faryniarz

customer_reviews.title: Best and most dynamic grill in its price range!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve put some heavy use on this thing since i got it less than a month ago. Grilling 3-4 times per week, i mostly do indirect and smoke based cooking. Without a doubt the best grill in its price range. Nothing beats the good ol American made Webber kettle for about $200 (and less of you get the more base models).
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Fournet

customer_reviews.title: Repacked Garbage with ZERO quality control
customer_reviews.text: Had the steaks marinating for 8 hours, decided it was time to put together my grill and enjoy a nice beer.. ...well GUESS WHAT MOTHERF*q&^%S... -THERE'S NO GRILL PLATE. -THERE'S NO BRIQUETTE GRATE. -THE HANDLE IS SMASHED -THE BOX HOWEVER IS IN PRISTINE CONDITION You don't need an engineering degree to figure out how that happened. Here I was thinking Weber had a "good name". From henceforth, I'll make sure to do everything I can to shed some light on how "great" WEBER really is.. You should be ashamed.
customer_reviews.author: The_guy_who_knows_things

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what he wanted
customer_reviews.text: Hubby wanted a new grill and I chose this one for him. He absolutely loves it! The design of the handle so it doesn't get hot is wonderful. Being able to tip the lid instead of trying to mount on the side of the grill is another great feature. Good job Weber!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jodi Hale

customer_reviews.title: Great quality grill
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and was sturdy when done. I thought I was missing a couple of small parts so I called Weber and left a message. They called back but I had found the parts. It was great that they called. Good customer service. Best charcoal grill ever.
customer_reviews.author: Jim hauser

customer_reviews.title: This grill is great
customer_reviews.text: After much thought i decided to purchase the Weber Master-Touch grill. It is nothing less than fantastic. The features are very helpful and I have absolutely enjoyed using the grill. Without the Master-Touch accessories and upgrades the Weber kettle is great. These items just make it better. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: I love the features and size of this grill
customer_reviews.text: Simply fabulous. It did take my daughter and I minute to put it together. But, it wasn't difficult really. I love the features and size of this grill. It is easy to empty the ashes and the wheels make moving the grill a breeze. I love the options for pans with the middle of the grill being removable and the added grilling "shelves" just adds even more space for cooking. The grill keeps a good temperature and it is easy to read. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A wonderful cooking tool.
customer_reviews.text: No more burnt meat. The temperature really is controllable. The charcoal pans are a must as they can be moved around for the desired type of cooking. It really saves on charcoal, as when you shut off the air it puts the fire out. It is cool enough to touch and store, after about an hour.
customer_reviews.author: re21253

customer_reviews.title: Cooks more flavorful foods and is well-made and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The whole family is enjoying the foods that were cooked on this grill - the flavor is so much better than a gas grill and the meats come off with excellent flavor and more moist than those cooked on a gas grill (which we've used for years). The design of this product is well-thought-out (okay not the leg assembly process - but everything else). Love this grill, love the results.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT CHARCOAL GRILL
customer_reviews.text: I have used the smaller Weber Grills and wanted to see if the bigger one was that much better. I can say YES!!! Every aspect from the lid, grill thickness, ability to clean, move, and most importantly just grill is that much better on this grill. If you enjoy using the smaller Weber grills and are on the fence of buying a bigger and much more expensive version, do not hesitate.
customer_reviews.author: Sarorn Prak

customer_reviews.title: The best (and hopefully last) grill I've owned.
customer_reviews.text: There is a reason why these grills are American classics. This is without a doubt the best charcoal grill I've owned. It is sturdy, heats beautifully, and is honestly nearly foolproof. There's nothing much to adjust or fiddle with. Get your coals going and watch your food. I can easily cook 12 burgers at a time. Strongly advise you also purchase a charcoal chimney, it'll cost less than all that lighter fluid you'll never need again.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Hynes

customer_reviews.title: For beginners only grill
customer_reviews.text: It's an ok grill for beginners but is not as strong as a handmade one. Just keep an eye on the vents because they will bend upwards and you will no longwr be able to clean the ash
customer_reviews.author: Ivan Ponce

customer_reviews.title: In Love
customer_reviews.text: The char-baskets are a bit small, but other than that I have no complaints. Worth every penny. I’ve been grilling or smoking every other day since it arrived at my door step. There is also a huge variety of aftermarket products you can buy here on amazon or the Weber website. Sometimes it’s cheaper on their website sometimes it’s the same price.
customer_reviews.author: Christian

customer_reviews.title: Nice Grill Kind of Hard to Put Together
customer_reviews.text: It’s a Weber so the quality is there. The legs are tough to put together. Everything else was easy to assemble. I’ve been grilling with some light smoking and it’s awesome. I also have a Weber gas grill that I haven’t been using since I bought this one. Pretty easy to clean for charcoal due to the ash container. I usually empty it 3-4 cooks.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: not our first Weber grill!
customer_reviews.text: We have used Weber kettle grills for almost 30 years and was gifted another brand of grill and even though this was a well known brand and was brand new. I purchased a new Weber. There is nothing like the indirect cooking of the Weber grill in my opinion. Will continue to use them for many years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loving it!
customer_reviews.text: Wings, whole chicken, pork butt, baked beans, brisket, steaks, hamburgers... I'm sure I've missing something. This was the first two months. So glad I'm back on charcoal. I feel a little sad when I look over at my Weber Spirit. Bless her heart.
customer_reviews.author: Helmo Alkou

customer_reviews.title: Webber quality
customer_reviews.text: Perfect charcoal grill. Great quality build and easy to put together. This was a gift for my son and daughter in law.They just love it.
customer_reviews.author: Hector De Lucca

customer_reviews.title: So much better than the 18" kettle grill
customer_reviews.text: This is such an improvement over the 18" version. I can actually get this one hot enough to do a proper sear. Clean up is much easier and much less messy too.
customer_reviews.author: Jay A Roehl

customer_reviews.title: Love this BBQ
customer_reviews.text: Used last night for first time and was everything you expect from a Weber Kettle Grill, in addition has some very nice features not found in the basic Weber Kettle.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: It's a Weber - enough said
customer_reviews.text: We had this weber from along time ago (upgraded to the big one), but bought this for our son. They have tricked it out to be just like the big one with all the extras (temp gauge, sliding lid holder, etc.). We love our Webers.
customer_reviews.author: John mcdonald

customer_reviews.title: If you are an avid Weber Grill user, paid a few extra bucks for this model. You will not be sorry.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a 10 year old one touch gold. Hey! That rhymes :-) This grill is very well-made and stands taller than my previous unit. The thermometer proves to be quite accurate and the updated wheels are certainly superior. If you are an avid Weber Grill user, paid a few extra bucks for this model. You will not be sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica D. Talbert

customer_reviews.title: Need clearly check goods before send
customer_reviews.text: I bought this model of grilling, including the grill grate in the current this model, but having received a package I was upset. On one side of the grill grate was bent and deflect one of two pens. grill grate was packed inside the grill. The grill itself is not damaged, and it can be concluded, that this is a factory defect. I live in another country, making the replacement of the axle is not available. The quality of grill is liked, but the seller failed me because didn’t heck clearly goods.
customer_reviews.author: Igor Sheiko

customer_reviews.title: Love my Weber!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had other Weber kettle grills but this one is so much better. Absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.author: Ron P.

customer_reviews.title: This thing sucks don't get it unless you like being frustrated.
customer_reviews.text: Worst grill I've ever bought. You need a physics degree to figure out how to keep temperature in this thing. I couldn't figure out what the big deal is or why this is so popular I've had charcoal grills before but never had as much trouble as this one. I'll be going back to propane.
customer_reviews.author: Mohamad

customer_reviews.title: A Weber kettle with better wheels for rolling around
customer_reviews.text: A Weber kettle with better wheels for rolling around. Not sure the grill with a removable center section improves anything, and may be harder to keep clean. I do like the heavier duty grill grate.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Stahl

customer_reviews.title: Great all around charcoal grill and smoke setup.
customer_reviews.text: I like the lid/lid holder compared to the standard model, plus the extras that would cost a lot more if purchased separately.
customer_reviews.author: Rambler

customer_reviews.title: Great Grill at a great price
customer_reviews.text: This grill is great! Very easy to assemble, we used the built app. The grill cooks evenly, and is easy to move around. Great Weber quality!
customer_reviews.author: Terri Amato

customer_reviews.title: Top of the line.
customer_reviews.text: The master weber. Ok so at first I was a bit worried about ordering the top of the line. However, once it arrived and I got it set up and started using it, I must say I'm impressed. I'm the envy of my neighbors. They really liked it and went out and bought the greenish one. hahahaha Very sturdy and made to last. Hoping it will hold up in the elements. I plan on doing some fall and winter BBQing if it doesnt snow too much. Cheers!
customer_reviews.author: F. D. Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Great grill
customer_reviews.text: I wish I’d taken a video of putting it together. It took maybe 30 minutes. Instructions are simple and easy to follow. All the parts are there. Very good quality and not damaged. I can’t wait to fire it up.
customer_reviews.author: anvildan

customer_reviews.title: Best kettle grill ever
customer_reviews.text: I love my Weber. Gives my meats great smoke taste with minimal effort.
customer_reviews.author: KW

customer_reviews.title: What a grill
customer_reviews.text: I love the lid holder. No more setting the lid on the dirty ground. The temperature gauge is a nice addition to the grill.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Prucha

customer_reviews.title: Love the Weber
customer_reviews.text: Love the Weber. Cooks evenly. I generally use indirect heat. I can use my brickets twice with this grill. Just snuff out (close) both top and bottom vents when done—they’ll lite up again next time. Saves money.
customer_reviews.author: thomas j schuerman

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Still!
customer_reviews.text: Since I do not have the old family Webber from my child hood I cannot directly compare, but, I think this one is high quality, heavy gage steel, good ceramic coating. High quality!!
customer_reviews.author: Al T.

customer_reviews.title: That grill grate is annoying.
customer_reviews.text: Better to just have a solid grill, grate without the pop out center. I just want a propane grill now.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Why did I wait so long?!
customer_reviews.text: Received the Weber kettle Saturday and used it Sunday afternoon...worked perfectly! Just cooked a couple of steaks, brats and asparagus, smoking meats will be next. I've purchased several cheaper charcoal grills hoping to save $$ but nothing compares to the original. BUY IT!!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Gourgouras

customer_reviews.title: Great grill
customer_reviews.text: It’s a Weber grill, great quality, smoked a shoulder on it first thing. One load of charcoal, controlled temperature perfectly. Can’t wait to do some burgers and brats.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite possession
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect. My life is complete. I can’t get it dirty. I’m going to keep this in my living room and get another one to cook on.
customer_reviews.author: James H. Henderson Pc

customer_reviews.title: It's a Weber. Nuff said!!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic grill, just put together and have used it twice. Great temp control, quality build. Well worth the $$$$
customer_reviews.author: Steven M

customer_reviews.title: Charcoal is King .. Hands Down
customer_reviews.text: Can't go wrong. Just buy it . The taste of charcoal grilled food is what you're looking for. Can't beat it. ....
customer_reviews.author: Bailey Boy

customer_reviews.title: My husband loves everything about it.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a gift for Father’s Day and he loves this grill! Has a great warranty and he is very pleased with the quality and workmanship of the grill. It’s easy to remove the ashes, great temperature control. So far, no complaints whatsoever!
customer_reviews.author: S. Cotter

customer_reviews.title: Tastier than gas grilling
customer_reviews.text: Still learning but love it. Wish I had bought a charcoal grill earlier
customer_reviews.author: frontier

customer_reviews.title: Another Great Grill
customer_reviews.text: This has got to be the third kettle grill that I've had from Weber over the past 2-3 decades of grilling. The first one was damaged after falling out of a truck, was replaced by a second identical that served me for several years before it was given away and replace with a gas grill. Now, I've gone back to the basics and loving every minute of it.
customer_reviews.author: Dean Lacy

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: Best Weber and charcoal grill I have ever owned, and you can get more accessories from the Weber for their products. ^_^
customer_reviews.author: GCM

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Every bit as good as we hoped it would be. Better even. Best grill I have ever used or owned.
customer_reviews.author: JBowsher

customer_reviews.title: I love the Weber Master Touch Grill
customer_reviews.text: The real question is...what do I love about the Weber Master Touch...everything! Worth every cent.
customer_reviews.author: Ales

customer_reviews.title: Get a different rack.
customer_reviews.text: The grill overall is nice and well built. The top rack with the center hole is a pain. I got a different rack because I didn’t like and had no use for the rack it came with.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Backyard One Stop Shop
customer_reviews.text: Quality and functionality is fantastic. Very versatile, has met all my expectations. Recommend for a one stop shop for your backyard, smoking and grilling. Enough available accessories to do everything I need....except smoke a full on brisket. Splurge for the Master touch if you can, but the basics will certainly do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great addition for son's cooking methdologies
customer_reviews.text: Our son already has gas grills and electric smoker. This charcoal grill was a great addition enhance his enjoyment of cooking. If history repeats itself, we expect it to last for years providing great service every time we use it.
customer_reviews.author: Ellis Counts

customer_reviews.title: I like it I would buy it again
customer_reviews.text: It is just what I expected to get with the Weber kettle good product
customer_reviews.author: Denny P

customer_reviews.title: Great grill
customer_reviews.text: Easy to adjust temperature. Great flavor of coming with charcoal and wood.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie H

customer_reviews.title: Two Legs a Little Too Big
customer_reviews.text: It’s a nice grill the only reason I give 4 stars is because two of the legs wouldn’t clip in because they’re a little too big.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the grill but removing and reattaching ash container can cause some frustration and time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality Control Not Great
customer_reviews.text: Just opened the box for assmembly and the leg for the first step is crimped and not usuable. Not a great first experience with Weber. :(
customer_reviews.author: Kaylan

customer_reviews.title: I really like it. A little slower getting the coals up ...
customer_reviews.text: Have used a gas grill for 30+ years. Friends have always used a Weber charcoal so I decided to try one. I really like it. A little slower getting the coals up to temp than a gas grill, but the flavor of the food is better. I'm impressed thus far.
customer_reviews.author: J.Z.

customer_reviews.title: Great Grill
customer_reviews.text: I've only owned an handful of grills in my life, but this is by far the best one for the price I've ever owned. At first I was going to go with a cheaper model. But I am really glad I didn't. The little things that they add to this model really make it worth it. As long as you aren't feeding 100 people and don't mind the wait for charcoal, this is a great grill.
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: Great grill!
customer_reviews.text: My father had one for years and he got rid of it and it still was in good shape. It is worth the extra cost. I love it. I bought a cover for it hoping I can get the same service out of mine.
customer_reviews.author: Steve F.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this grill. Easy to use and clean, as well as control the fire and temp.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry W.

customer_reviews.title: Enjoying it!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect grill for beginners! Excellent heat hold and super easy to clean ashes after cooking. Comes with charcoal baskets so it is very easy to do indirect heat zones.
customer_reviews.author: Artem Utiupin

customer_reviews.title: It is perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I have a Santa Maria grill got this along with a Slow-n-Sear to smoke chickens etc. It is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Robert C Kent

customer_reviews.title: Great grill! Weber makes the best charcoal grills
customer_reviews.text: Great grill! Weber makes the best charcoal grills. The grill arrived in one large with assembly required. Great instructions made it easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Toni

customer_reviews.title: Great Grill!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite grill so far. Decided to go with this vs. the performer. Glad I did. The smaller foot print works well on my deck. The inserts are nice and I use the searing plate quite a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Mike Terranella

customer_reviews.title: My first grill
customer_reviews.text: I received this grill as a gift and I love it. I've only used it twice so far. It's easy to use and clean. The additional features like the charcoal baskets and lid holder add to the experience. I recommend using the 3D assembly instructions on the BILT app.
customer_reviews.author: KDR

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.text: We BBQ at least once a week. This grill is easy to use and easy to clean. I love that this Weber grill has a thermometer and that you can hang the lid on the side of the grill.
customer_reviews.author: Eric V.

customer_reviews.title: My husband is well on his way to wearing this ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband is well on his way to wearing this one out, he owns three Weber grills currently, and this has got to be his 10th grill or so. Gas, Propane, or charcoal, he loves and owns them all
customer_reviews.author: Karen Miller

customer_reviews.title: nothing beats a weber
customer_reviews.text: tried other grills and did not like. went back to weber
customer_reviews.author: gordo

customer_reviews.title: You can't ever go wrong with a Weber!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great grill. Relatively easy to assemble and very sturdy. Easy to clean. Grills like a charm!
customer_reviews.author: ohayoogal

customer_reviews.title: Has everything you need
customer_reviews.text: I've used a gas grill for years, but love the flavor I get with this webber. I purchased the sear grate for it as well. It puts diamond grill marks on my steaks in two flips. Easy to maintain and well-built. Also a large community on YouTube for tips and tricks on how to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Francisco A. Cuevas

customer_reviews.title: Excellent grill bat none.
customer_reviews.text: Love my Weber! Easy to dump the ashes. Easy to assemble. Small footprint for storage. The flavor of a charcoal grill is far superior to a gas grill. And there's is just something about a man and fire. :)
customer_reviews.author: Mister C

customer_reviews.title: Still in my living room upside down!!  can't get one leg on!! so upset
customer_reviews.text: This is a bear to get the legs to pop in correct!
customer_reviews.author: Mimisheri

customer_reviews.title: Best grill hands down
customer_reviews.text: Versatility and flavor make this grill the top. Smoking, searing, slow cooking this grill does it all.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Segui

customer_reviews.title: Great Product from Weber
customer_reviews.text: A top of the line product with excellent features! It took a little bit of work to assemble, but it is definitely worth the effort.
customer_reviews.author: ExE122

customer_reviews.title: amazing!
customer_reviews.text: amazing amazing amazing. i have the WSM 22", but for smaller cooks on a regular day i use less charcoal this is just a great grill/smoker indirect cooks.
customer_reviews.author: Jam7

customer_reviews.title: I'm sure it's a good grill - I've owned Webers in the past
customer_reviews.text: Mixed emotions on this product ... I'm sure it's a good grill - I've owned Webers in the past, and they do the job, and last a long time ... But I have to say that, putting it together was absolute pain ! Getting those legs inserted into the connectors was tough - 'way-too-hard. The directions weren't entirely clear in showing how to assemble it, and took a while to figure-out. Also, there was a screw missing for the handle assembly; luckily, I found one in my tool kit that fit. Anyway, it was tough-going, and it took some shine off of owning this grill ...
customer_reviews.author: Beach Lover

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Have had a gas grill and absolutely love this Weber. Love the taste of the food. Different learning curve vs gas cooking, but not difficult. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: JBA

customer_reviews.title: Gool ol' Weber quality
customer_reviews.text: Weber has always been a good brand and it continues to be so with this design. We are enjoying it.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Aistrup

customer_reviews.title: Graduated to the Master-Touch
customer_reviews.text: I've been a Weber charcoal griller for a long time but only with Original Kettle. I love my new Master-Touch and look forward to learning to master all the great accessories that come with it.
customer_reviews.author: Brent Traylor

customer_reviews.title: Way worth it
customer_reviews.text: Bought it in time for summer and man, I love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Inside rack broke first time used. As much as you pay for a Weber, you would think it would stand up to name!!
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Doolittle

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: Love this grill. Has everything you need for a good charcoal grill.
customer_reviews.author: melly

customer_reviews.title: great grill, cheap shaky legs
customer_reviews.text: grill is really nice except the legs. this thing feels so cheap and shaky i'm afraid to move it very much. great grill but for this price i don't think weber should have gone so cheap on the legs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: nice grill
customer_reviews.text: quality of product is what i expected. Looks and performance is great
customer_reviews.author: james c

product_meta.title: Weber 14501001 Master-Touch Charcoal Grill, 22-Inch, Black
product_meta.description: Color:BlackThe ritual of charcoal grilling meets the convenient features and the wow factor of the Master-Touch. Equipped with a hinged Gourmet BBQ System cooking grate, you’re also able to purchase additional inserts, like the wok or griddle, to cook smoky chili or breakfast outside on the grill. Equipped with a Tuck-Away lid holder for convenient lid placement, taller legs, and Char-Basket fuel holders for easily arranging briquettes, all you need to focus on is mastering your dish.
feature_bullets: Holds up to 13 burgers made with a Weber burger press
Slide the lid into the Tuck-Away lid holder on the side of the grill to avoid placing it on the ground
Cooking grate is compatible with GBS inserts and is hinged for easily adding charcoal while grilling
Tool hooks for hanging grilling tools, such as a spatula and tongs
Built-in lid thermometer displays your grill’s internal temperature. Total cooking area - 443 square inches

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping. Learn More
